Package interfaces

Interface IProjectAdmService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectAdminService
public interface IProjectAdmService
The IProjectAdmService interface defines the methods for managing both hospital staff and inventory, including adding, updating, and removing staff and inventory items.

  • Method Summary

    Description

  • Method Details

    • addOrUpdateStaff

      void addOrUpdateStaff(Staff staffMember)
      Adds or updates a staff member's information.
      Parameters:
      staffMember - The Staff object containing the staff member's details.

    • removeStaff

      boolean removeStaff(String staffId)
      Removes a staff member based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      staffId - The ID of the staff member to be removed.
      Returns:
      True if the staff member was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • getAllStaff

      List<Staff> getAllStaff()
      Retrieves a list of all hospital staff members.
      Returns:
      A list of Staff objects representing all staff members.

    • updateStockLevel

      boolean updateStockLevel(String medicineName, int quantity)
      Updates the stock level for a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medication.
      quantity - The new stock quantity.
      Returns:
      True if the stock level was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • updateLowStockAlert

      boolean updateLowStockAlert(String medicineName, int lowStockLevel)
      Updates the low stock alert level for a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medication.
      lowStockLevel - The new low stock alert level.
      Returns:
      True if the low stock alert level was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • removeMedication

      boolean removeMedication(String medicineName)
      Removes a medication from the inventory based on its name.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medication to be removed.
      Returns:
      True if the medication was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • getAllInventory

      List<Inventory> getAllInventory()
      Retrieves a list of all inventory items.
      Returns:
      A list of Inventory objects representing all inventory items.

    • approveReplenishmentRequest

      boolean approveReplenishmentRequest(String medicineName)
      Approves a replenishment request for a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medication.
      Returns:
      True if the replenishment request was successfully approved, false otherwise.
